subject: Basketball
Abortion
Extortion and Blackmail
lead_paragraph: Rick Pitino, the Louisville men’s basketball coach, told the police he paid for an abortion for the woman accused of trying to extort $10 million from him, a newspaper said.
snippet: Rick Pitino, the Louisville men’s basketball coach, told the police he paid for an abortion for the woman accused of trying to extort $10 million from him, a newspaper said.
